author: Sam Ross
description: Just enjoyed a hearty meal? Well, this digestivo is just the ticket. If you're not accustomed to the taste of fernet then the first couple of sips may be challenging, but then this very refreshing cocktail becomes eminently sippable, quaffable even, and certainly stomach-settling – well, I think so.
name: Midnight Stinger
recipeIngredient: 12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
